item.title: 환희,Duncan James - Sooner Or Later (한국어 Ver.)
item.description:
슬픔을 겁내 마요
어둠을 치우고서
내 큰 시련 두고 가요
태양 아래 아픔 태우고
지친 영혼 믿고 떠나요
Sooner or later
가슴 속 저편
불어오는 그 바람은
지금 다시
기억 시작해
이제 부터 아무도
앞서지 못하도록
멀어진 이별에
순간 속에서
언젠가 찾아올
사랑 위해서
Love has
left you rejected
You put up your
defences
Now your heart’s
been tried and tested
Now you join the
land of broken dreams
No good wishing for
what could’ve been
Sooner or later
you’re gonna wake up
And find what your
looking for
Like a diamond washed
up on the shore
In the meantime
you’re feeling like
You’re lost
without a friend
Sooner or
later you’re
Gonna love again
Sooner or later
You’re
gonna love again
Don’t be
scared of your shadow
You can’t hide
from your sorrow
Sooner or later
you’re gonna wake up
And find what
your looking for
Like a diamond washed
up on the shore
In the meantime
you’re feeling like
You’re lost
without a friend
Sooner or later
you’re gonna
Love again
Sooner or later
You’re gonna
love again
Sooner or later
you’re gonna
Love
again
